name: Lunar Catventure
description:
Lunar Catventure

It's a short story about a curious cat that wanders around the moon and often falls into the same crater. But almost everything is prepared for the rescue! Help the little puss gather some items for a counterweight, but beware of thieving moon roaches!

This game was made for Mini Jam 130. No free assets used. 

Controls : A and D for movement. Items are gathered automatically.

Game Designer/Team Lead:

Anton Obnosov - https://itch.io/profile/graywarden8

Narrative designer:

Anastasia Stepko - https://viermis.itch.io/

 Unity Developer:

Vladislav Shoshin - https://itch.io/profile/pixel-skoldpadda

Sound designer:

Ilya Sasin - https://disk.yandex.ru/d/qwgFYZaUAqSyJw

2D Artist:

Daria Vinnichenko - https://www.artstation.com/darina_vinnich
